channel.title: Data Source on Computational Demography @UW
channel.description: Recent content in Data Source on Computational Demography @UW

item.title: Populating the Globe with World Pop
item.description: This week’s meeting of the CSDE-CWG was led by Nathan Welch from the Department of Statistics here at the University of Washington. Nathan walked us through his experience attending the Inaugural WorldPop Winter School, a brief course that looks to introduce students, government workers, and NGO employees on the resources the resources produced by World Pop. The Agenda of World Pop As stated on the Word Pop website the goal of the World Pop organization are to “Meet the needs of [contemporary data on human population distributions] through the provision of detailed and open-access population distribution dataset built using transparent approaches.
